DOC.brief_summary: Part II: Examine cognitive performance of stimulant abusers (methamphetamine and cocaine) during recovery by assessing their cognitive function at monthly intervals.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Correlates of Substance Abuse, Part 2 - 16
DOC.detailed_description: Part II: Examine cognitive performance of stimulant abusers (methamphetamine and cocaine) during recovery by assessing their cognitive function at monthly intervals.
DOC.criteria: Please contact site for information M/F. Meet DSMIV criteria for stimulant dependence. Agree to conditions of the study and sign informed consent.
